coupon.sys.services

Class CompanyWebService

  • java.lang.Object
    • coupon.sys.services.CompanyWebService

  • @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RestController
public class CompanyWebService
extends java.lang.Object
    The Web Service class manages all the requests sent by the Company client
    Author:
    Yehuda.Hizmi

    • Method Detail

      • createCoupon

        @RequestMapping(value="/company/create-coupon",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> createCoupon(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Coupon coupon,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                           org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This web service activates the create coupon method at the Company Facade class. The method adds a new Coupon to the DB and also a new record to company coupon table
        Parameters:
        coupon - - the coupon to be added to the DB (sent from the client side via JSON Object)
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - the exception that was thrown from the Company Facade

      • removeCoupon

        @RequestMapping(value="/company/remove-coupon/{coupon_id}",
                method=DELETE,
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> removeCoupon(@PathVariable(value="coupon_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         long coupon_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Coupon coupon,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This web service activates the remove coupon method at the Company Facade class. The method deletes a coupon from the DB (only the coupons of the logged in company)
        Parameters:
        coupon - - the coupon to be deleted from to the DB (sent from the client side via JSON Object)
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - the exception that was thrown from the company Facade

      • updateCoupon

        @RequestMapping(value="/company/update-coupon/{coupon_id}",
                method=PUT,
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> updateCoupon(@PathVariable(value="coupon_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      long coupon_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Coupon coupon,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This web service activates the update coupon method at the Company Facade class. The method updates a coupon in the DB (only the coupons of the logged in company)
        Parameters:
        coupon - - the coupon to be updated (sent from the client side via JSON Object)
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - the exception that was thrown from the Company Facade

      • viewCompanyInfromation

        @RequestMapping(value="/company/company-info",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> viewCompanyInfromation(org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This web service activates the view company information method at the Company Facade class. The method returns the information of the logged in company
        Returns:
        - return the information of the logged in company
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - the exception that was thrown from the Company Facade

      • getCoupon

        @RequestMapping(value="/company/get-coupon/{coupon_id}",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCoupon(@PathVariable(value="coupon_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 long coupon_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This web service activates the get coupon method at the Company Facade class. The method returns a company from the DB based on the provided id
        Parameters:
        coupon_id - - the id of the requested coupon
        Returns:
        - the coupon that matches the id
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - the exception that was thrown from the Company Facade

      • getAllCoupons

        @RequestMapping(value="/company/get-all-coupons",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllCoupons(org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This web service activates the get all coupons method at the Company Facade class. The method returns all the coupons in the DB (only the coupons that belong to the the logged in company)
        Returns:
        - return all the coupons that are linked to the asked company
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - the exception that was thrown from the Company Facade

      • getCouponByPrice

        @RequestMapping(value="/company/coupon-by-price",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCouponByPrice(@RequestParam(value="price",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 double price,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This web service activates the get coupon by price method at the Company Facade class. The method returns all the coupons with a price equals or less than the price send as a parameter
        Parameters:
        lessthanprice - - the price the compare to
        Returns:
        - all the coupons that are priced equals or less than the price send as a parameter
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - the exception that was thrown from the Company Facade

      • getCouponByDate

        @RequestMapping(value="/company/coupon-by-date",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCouponByDate(@RequestParam(value="date") @DateTimeFormat(pattern="yyyy-MM-dd")
                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.util.Date date,
                                                                                                                                                                                                               org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This web service activates the get coupon by date method at the Company Facade class. The method returns all the coupons with a date equals or less than the date send as a parameter
        Parameters:
        lessthanprice - - the date the compare to
        Returns:
        - all the coupons that are dated equals or less than the date send as a parameter
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - the exception that was thrown from the Company Facade

      • getCouponByType

        @RequestMapping(value="/company/coupon-by-type",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCouponByType(@RequestParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                                                                                                               CouponType type,
                                                                                                                                                                                                               org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This web service activates the get coupon by type method at the Company Facade class. The method returns all the coupons with the relevant type send as a parameter
        Parameters:
        coupontype - - the type of coupons to be returned
        Returns:
        - all the coupons that are match to the type type send as a parameter
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - the exception that was thrown from the Company Facade
